description: Vulnerability in the Oracle iStore product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: User Management).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.14. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle iStore.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle iStore accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
